title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Guimaraes - Portugal landmarks -version 1.0
description:
In this video we are going to have a look at the city of Guimaraes which is located in the Northern part of Portugal close the city of Braga and the small Braga airport (LPBR). The city itself was not updated as part of the latest World Update so one of the developers started working on improving the city by adding multiple point of interest and photogrammetry content. The package itself contains the following landmarks:

- Guimaraes Castle
- Dukes of Braganza Palace 
- King D. Afonso Henriques Statue
- Church of SÃ£o Miguel do Castelo
- Aqui Nasceu Portugal Wall
- Penha Church
- Pope Pio IX Statue
- Mumadona Statue
- Citania de Briteiros 
- Teleferico (Static)
- Campo da Feira Gardens
- Hotel Fundador
- Vila Verde Eucaliptus Tree

If you would like to try the scenery yourself, download it via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/30734/guimaraes-portugal-landmarks
